name: Monastery Loremaster
text:
Megamorph {5}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Monastery Loremaster is turned face up, return target noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard to your hand.
